item.title: The Girl-of-the-Month Club, Part 5
item.description: The rich can buy anything in America. Knowing this, one clever entrepenuer started a service for gentlemen called The Girl-of-the-Month Club. For a fee, you could subscribe to have a different teen or preteen girl, delivered to your house for an overnight sexual fantasy. Each month you would receive a different girl, dressed to provide the fantasy. This is the story of one year in the life of Blake Winthope and how he enjoyed his subscription. Part 5 is about how May's Child, The Teenage Slut, surprises him and his buddies at their monthly poker game.

item.title: A Master Child-Abuser At Work
item.description: This is episode 3 in my spin-off from my long-running 'pedo ring' series, which featured a rugged and fairly good-looking pedo called Sean and 9yo Hannah as the central characters. Now, he has had to start all over again. The first paragraph of each episode summarizes what's gone on before, so can be enjoyed separately. item.title: Jeune Fleur NÃ©e Pour La Soumission
item.description: Sabrina is just 14 years old. She had few opportunities to become familiar with sex, through the speeches of other students in her class, or a few photos seen in magazines or on the internet. She lives with her father and her 9-year-old little sister, her mother left since she was a child, and only her grandfather sometimes completes their small family. Brunette, she has a pretty face that she doesn’t know how to show off.
